channel.title: Good idea?
channel.description:
I am thinking of building a node-based tree data structure to organize and create all of the NPC chat interfaces. Do you think this is a good idea? pros/cons?
FYI: by this time i speak java more fluently than i do English.
at worst it is a good learning experience :P
